item.title: I-80 East - Exit 48
item.description: I-80 east at Exit 48 - N. Texas St./Manuel Campos Parkway. Approaching Exit 51A - Lagoon Valley Road/Cherry Glen Road.

item.title: I-80 East - Exits 43 and 44A
item.description: I-80 east at Exit 43 - CA-12 East/Rio Vista/Suisun City. Approaching Exit 44A - Abernathy Road. I-80 continues east to Fairfield and Sacramento. CA-12 east leaves I-80 here and heads east across the north end of the delta.

item.title: I-80 East Approaching Exit 43
item.description: I-80 east approaching Exit 43 - CA-12 East/Rio Vista/Suisun City.

item.title: I-80 East - Exit 41
item.description: I-80 east at Exit 41 - Suisun Valley Road/Pittman Road. Approaching Weigh Station.

item.title: I-80 East - Exit 40
item.description: I-80 east at Exit 40 - I-680/Benicia/Green Valley Road. I-680 loops across the east side of the Bay Area, and ends in San Jose. This is the northern end of I-680.

item.title: I-80 East - Exit 39
item.description: I-80 east at Exit 39 - Red Top Road.

item.title: I-80 West - Exit 39A
item.description: I-80 west at Exit 39A - Red Top Road.

item.title: I-80 West - Exits 39B and 39A
item.description: I-80 west at Exit 39B - CA-12 West/Napa/Sonoma. Approaching Exit 39A - Red Top Road. CA-12 west leaves I-80 here, and crosses into the Napa Valley. I-80 continues west towards Vallejo and San Francisco.

item.title: I-80 East - Exit 47A and Exit 47B
